New Records: Lonzo Ball tallied 5 points and 4 assists in 13 minutes and 39 seconds against the New Orleans Pelicans on October 23, 2024.
Key Match Events: The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Chicago Bulls, 123-111, in their season opener on October 23, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: Bulls coach Billy Donovan limited Lonzo Ball's playing time to 14-16 minutes due to his recovery monitoring, and he ended up playing 13 minutes and 39 seconds.
Post-Match Reflections: Lonzo Ball's comeback story was highlighted, considering his history of injuries, including a cartilage transplant in March 2023.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls traded Alex Caruso for Josh Giddey from the OKC Thunder during the offseason.
